p:
Rue ( Ruta graveolens L.) has been one of the key plants of the European pharmacopoeia since ancient times for the use in tremors, paralysis, nervine disorders, and joint pain
9 . And nowadays, it becomes medicine in Mediterranean region, due to its prominent biological activities, especially neuroprotection
9, 10 . Rutin, psoralen, limonene, and pinene are reported as main constituents in this plant extracts or rue oils
9, 10 .
